content:
Essential reading:

https://www.absurdintelligence.com/how-do-we-rehabilitate-activism/

"..In the rapid transformation we underwent as a society over the last seven years. We have moved almost instantly from ignorance and soft climate denial to a kind of tacit acceptance of climate collapse. It was fascinating...to watch how unable we were to stay, for any meaningful length, in a place of time knowing the truth of our predicament without being guaranteed its solution. It‚Äôs something that as a society we seem to find almost unbearable. "
